content: Thank you Veterans for all the sacrafices. May You NEVER be forgotton, There will always be a tear in my eyes to remind me of your sacrafices, and your bravery. Thank You to all the active duty, retired and the disabled veterans, and Thank you to the Veterans that gave their all. D.J.
reply: Thank you Veterans for all the sacrafices. May You NEVER be forgotton, There will always be a tear in my eyes to remind me of your sacrafices, and your bravery. Thank You to all the active duty, retired and the disabled veterans, and Thank you to the Veterans that gave their all. D.J.
title: Thank You

content: I want to say thank you too.
